allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$token = ''eyJpc3MiOiJCbHVyLnZuIiwic3ViIjoiMGY0ZjNlMzQtMWFmNS00YmRhLWI4YTgtOTgyZmQ4ZDE5YzY1IiwiZXhwIjoxNzY0NjA4NDU5LCJpYXQiOjE3NjQ2MDQ4NTksImp0aSI6Ijg4NjIwMTQ5LWUxMTYtNDEwMS04N2VhLWU1ODc3NTMwMzRiZiIsInNjb3BlIjoiUk9MRV9VU0VSIn0''
$decoded = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString([System.Convert]::FromBase64String($token + ''='' * (4 - $token.Length % 4)))
$obj = ConvertFrom-Json $decoded
Write-Host ''Token Payload:''
Write-Host $obj
Write-Host ''''
Write-Host ''Current Unix Time:'' (Get-Date -UFormat %s)
Write-Host ''Token Expires:'' $obj.exp
Write-Host ''Expired:'' ($obj.exp -lt (Get-Date -UFormat %s))
")
